posts.postText:
Your In-Game name: ryancarson25
Your Steam ID: STEAM_0:1:32333637 
Reason:Map Exploiting
Length of Ban/Date and Time of Unban:3 Days
What server were you playing?:TTT
Who banned you?:Mr. Gash
Why should we unban you?: I'm sorry for what I did, but i didn't intend on interfering with the gameplay of others. I was jumping out of the map to explore and I told everyone to tell me when i was last human then I would slay myself. I didn't think that it would effect anyone and I am sorry if I did.

Ryancarson, I have told you many times to not go outside the map previously. Yet every round you insist on saying "I'LL SLAY MYSELF WHEN LAST HUMAN"

There's a reason we tell you not to do it. Someone else might see it and say "Well if he's doing it I can too!" and then THEY go outside the map.

Earlier you flat out disobeyed the orders, and you said you were going to stop, last time.
So does this mean that im not being unbanned?
